title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Prerequisite: NoneIntroduction to HCI methods. Interaction styles and general design. Various user interfaces and interaction strategies. Programming usable interfaces. Software architectures for user interface. Human factors of interface design. Interface metaphors and conceptual models. Screen design. HCI and World Wide Web. Task analysis. Usability evaluation, Collaborative systems, Groupware and Coordination technologies.
